channel.title: Astronomy fact of the Day
channel.description: RSS feed of the astronomy fact of the day.

item.title: Chronology of the universe
item.description: The chronology of the universe describes the history and future of the universe according to Big Bang cosmology. Research published in 2015 estimates the earliest stages of the universe's existence as taking place 13.8 billion years ago, with an uncertainty of around 21 million years at the 68% confidence level.
